description: Managers, parents, students, teachers, vendors, employees and everyone else has to say NO at some time. Many struggle with telling someone no and this class will give you a proven step by step process that ANYONE can use to say NO without guilt and without damaging your relationships. This 4 part video class is easy to understand and apply. Dan teaching psychological truths in a simple pill like form that you'll want to use right away. You're only 20 minutes away from having a tool you'll use for the rest of your life. This tool will save you time, stress and help you get what you really want.
title: Say No Without Guilt
